answerText: lensmaker's formula or equation [do not accept the "lens equation"][10] angles of incidence and refractive indices for light travelling through an interface of two materials.
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Ike Jose + Tanay Kothari | 16 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: It states that the one over the focal length is equal to n divided by R, all minus one over R, where n is the refractive index and R is the radius of curvature. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this formula from optics.
